species.name: seel
descriptions: Although it can't walk well on land, it is a graceful swimmer. It especially loves being in frigid seas.
A Pok√©mon that lives on icebergs. It swims in the sea using the point on its head to break up ice.
Covered with light blue fur, its hide is thick and tough. It is active in bitter cold of -40 degrees Fahrenheit.
In daytime, it is often found asleep on the seabed in shallow waters. Its nostrils close while it swims.
It has always been supposed that Seel live only in cold seas. Their having shown up in Alola is a mystery.

abilities.name: thick-fat
abilities.effect: Halves damage from fire and ice moves.

abilities.name: hydration
abilities.effect: Cures any major status ailment after each turn during rain.

abilities.name: ice-body
abilities.effect: Heals for 1/16 max HP after each turn during hail.  Protects against hail damage.
